info.official_title: TAS-102 Combined With Bevacizumab and Tislelizumab Third-line or Above in the Treatment of Liver Metastasis in Colorectal Cancer : An Open-label 、Phase Ⅱ Clinical Trial

identified_line.line: * Patients who provided informed consent and voluntarily enrolled
* Patients with liver metastasis of advanced colorectal adenocarcinoma with MSS confirmed by pathology;
* 18-75 years old;
* Measurable target lesions according to RECIST V1.1 assessment criteria;

criterions.exact_snippets: Measurable target lesions according to RECIST V1.1 assessment criteria

requirement.expected_value: according to RECIST V1.1 assessment criteria

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Measurable target lesions according to RECIST V1.1 assessment criteria

requirement.expected_value: according to RECIST V1.1 assessment criteria

identified_line.line: * Progression after standard second-line treatment (irinotecan, oxaliplatin, or fluorouracil);

criterions.exact_snippets: Progression after standard second-line treatment (irinotecan, oxaliplatin, or fluorouracil)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Progression after standard second-line treatment (irinotecan, oxaliplatin, or fluorouracil)

identified_line.line: * 0 ~ 2 points according to ECOG quality of life score;

criterions.exact_snippets: 0 ~ 2 points according to ECOG quality of life score

and_criteria.exact_snippets: 0 ~ 2 points according to ECOG quality of life score

identified_line.line: * Drugs can be taken orally
* Estimated survival ≥3 months;
* Women of childbearing age should comply with contraceptive measures if pregnancy test is negative;

then_criteria.exact_snippets: Women of childbearing age should comply with contraceptive measures

identified_line.line: * Ascites with no obvious symptoms and no clinical intervention;
* Adherence to scheduled visits, treatment plans, laboratory tests, and other study procedures Willingness and ability.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
* Previous application of TAS-102;
* Pregnant or lactating women;
* No contraception during the reproductive period;

criterions.exact_snippets: No contraception during the reproductive period

not_criteria.exact_snippets: No contraception during the reproductive period

identified_line.line: * patients known to have a history of allergy to any study drug, similar drug or excipient;

criterions.exact_snippets: patients known to have a history of allergy to any study drug
patients known to have a history of allergy to any ... similar drug
patients known to have a history of allergy to any ... excipient

or_criteria.exact_snippets: patients known to have a history of allergy to any study drug
patients known to have a history of allergy to any ... similar drug
patients known to have a history of allergy to any ... excipient

identified_line.line: * Patients with a history of thromboembolism, except those caused by PICC;
* Patients with active infection;
* Patients with uncontrolled hypertension (systolic blood pressure ≥160 mmHg and diastolic blood pressure ≥90) MmHg);
* Received any anti-tumor therapy and participated in other clinical studies within 4 weeks prior to enrollment.

criterions.exact_snippets: participated in other clinical studies within 4 weeks prior to enrollment

and_criteria.exact_snippets: participated in other clinical studies within 4 weeks prior to enrollment

identified_line.line: * Adequate organ and bone marrow functions, ecg, blood, biochemical and other basic tests are not contraindications of chemotherapy;

criterions.exact_snippets: Adequate organ and bone marrow functions

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Adequate organ and bone marrow functions

identified_line.line: * Patients with risk of massive gastrointestinal bleeding or gastrointestinal obstruction;
* Patients with brain metastases with clinical symptoms or imaging evidence;
* Contraindications for treatment of other chronic diseases;

criterions.exact_snippets: Contraindications for treatment of other chronic diseases

identified_line.line: * Previous immunotherapy-related myocarditis, pneumonia, colitis, hepatitis, kidney Inflammation and other conditions, the current AE is still ≥2;
* According to THE NCI CTCAE 5.0 assessment criteria, there are all types of existing cases due to previous treatment Patients with grade ≥2 toxic reactions;
* Other conditions that the investigator determines are not suitable for inclusion in the study.

criterions.exact_snippets: Other conditions that the investigator determines are not suitable for inclusion in the study.
